text:
Nashville, TN

Fresh company in eDiscovery needs an experienced MVC framework guy. Can work remotely (REMOTE).

JavaScript JavaScript expert.  Experience with DOM manipulation and MVC frameworks.  We like Angular JS, but are looking for guys who have experience with frameworks such as Ember, Backbone, etc. Experience with canvas, animation frames, RaphaelJS for pretty presentation - drawings & graphs.

HTML, CSS3 Extremely capable in HTML and CSS3, SASS/SCSS, TwitterBootstrap
